value: {"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.12.4.1", "description": "Event logging: Event logs recording user activities, exceptions, faults and information security events should be produced, kept and regularly reviewed.", "category": "Incident Response", "severity": "Low"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.13.1.1", "description": "This obligation requires the implementation of a network security policy that protects information in networks and its supporting information processing facilities.", "category": "Network Security", "severity": "High"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.12.4.1", "description": "Event logging: Event logs recording user activities, exceptions, faults and information security events shall be produced, kept and regularly reviewed.", "category": "Incident Response", "severity": "Low"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.13.1.1", "description": "This control requires the implementation of a policy on the use of network services. It is designed to prevent unauthorized access, damage to information, and interference with the networked services.", "category": "Network Security", "severity": "High"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.9.4.2", "description": "Where required by the access control policy, use of suitable authentication techniques to substantiate the claimed identity of user.", "category": "Access Control", "severity": "High"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.13.1.1", "description": "Network controls. Networks shall be managed and controlled to protect information in systems and applications.", "category": "Network Security", "severity": "Low"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.12.2.1", "description": "Control A.12.2.1 refers to 'Controls against malware'. In the context of this action, it means that the system has detected a potential threat and has quarantined it to prevent any damage. The confidence and severity are low, but the correlation is high, indicating that the system has found a strong match for the threat pattern, but the potential impact is low.", "category": "Malware Protection", "severity": "Low"}

{"compliance_framework": "ISO 27001", "obligation_id": "A.12.2.1", "description": "Control A.12.2.1 refers to 'Controls Against Malware'. It requires the implementation of detection, prevention, and recovery controls to protect against malware and includes the ability to quarantine potentially harmful software.", "category": "Incident Response", "severity": "High"}
